5g.title: 5.5G
5g.subtitle: Conectividad del mañana, hoy
5g.description: Con la introducción de 5.5G, MCI da un gran paso hacia el futuro de la conectividad. Esta tecnología de próxima generación ofrece velocidades superiores a 5G, latencia ultrabaja y una capacidad significativamente mayor. Con 5.5G, los usuarios pueden experimentar internet ultrarrápido, realidad aumentada y virtual avanzada, aplicaciones de IoT a gran escala y servicios de ciudades inteligentes, todo sin límites y de manera fluida. Esta evolución posiciona a MCI como pionero de la transformación digital en Irán, donde la conectividad no solo es más rápida, sino también más inteligente, confiable y verdaderamente inmersiva.

fintech.title: Fintech
fintech.subtitle: Finanzas digitales seguras e inteligentes
fintech.description: El ecosistema fintech de MCI transforma los pagos digitales y servicios financieros mediante innovación y seguridad. Nuestras soluciones integrales permiten transacciones fluidas, billeteras digitales y plataformas de pago inteligentes que empoderan a empresas e individuos. Al combinar infraestructura de telecomunicaciones con tecnología financiera avanzada, construimos una economía digital confiable, accesible e inclusiva para todos los iraníes.

sections.title: FINANCIAL SUPER-APP
sections.description: This platform offers users a wide range of services, from financial payments and bill settlements to registration for educational courses and accommodation rentals. It also provides a secure and integrated digital wallet for managing transactions, and users can receive a physical card linked to it for purchases at various stores. On average, the application is installed 208,000 times per month and has around 70,000 daily active users, who spend an average of approximately 168 seconds per day on the app.

sections.title: MCI CVC
sections.description: This fund is dedicated to investing in innovative and technology-driven projects and companies. Its mission is to identify and monitor emerging technologies while enabling their integration into the national value chain. Key investment areas include Artificial Intelligence, Internet of Things, Microelectronics, 5G communications, Industry 4.0, Smart Logistics, Communication Systems and Equipment, as well as Augmented and Virtual Reality.

sections.title: SIM POS
sections.description: SIM-POS is a specialized and secure SIM card designed for mobile point-of-sale (mPOS) devices. It plays a key role in transmitting financial transaction data to payment service provider (PSP) networks. This SIM card provides a stable and dedicated connection to banking and payment servers without the need for public internet, thereby enhancing the speed, security, and reliability of transactions.

platforms.title: Plataformas
platforms.subtitle: Educación, entretenimiento, salud y comercio
platforms.description: Las plataformas digitales de MCI crean un ecosistema integrado donde educación, entretenimiento, salud y comercio electrónico convergen en una experiencia fluida. Desde entornos de aprendizaje interactivos y entretenimiento en streaming hasta servicios de telemedicina y mercados en línea, nuestras plataformas están diseñadas para enriquecer la vida diaria, empoderar comunidades y desbloquear nuevas posibilidades en el panorama digital de Irán.

sections.title: E-LEARNING PLATFORM
sections.description: This application launched in April 2020 and, with features such as live streaming, voice chat, educational videos, and a digital magazine, has become the largest educational platform in the Middle East. The app has so far achieved 45 million unique installs, hosted over 3 million simultaneous users at the peak of the Omicron outbreak, and has up to 21 million daily active users. More than 202 billion messages and 37 billion documents have been exchanged through it, and over 10,000 educational contents have been provided for grades one through twelve.

sections.title: E-MARKETPLACE
sections.description: This online store was founded in 2006 and has gradually become one of the main players in the country's e-commerce sector. The platform offers a wide range of products, including digital devices, home and kitchen goods, clothing, and books, and leverages an extensive supplier network and advanced logistics system to provide fast and reliable services to customers. According to the latest statistics, the store receives over 5.5 million daily visitors and sells more than 14.5 million products across various categories.

sections.title: REAL ESTATE PLATFORM
sections.description: This startup, aiming to simplify, accelerate, and reduce risks in real estate transactions, began its operations in 2020. Today, the platform provides nationwide coverage and offers a range of specialized services, including property evaluation and pricing, expert consulting, an intelligent buying and selling assistant, and advertisement posting for its users. This service has approximately 28.5 million daily active users and 46.4 million monthly active users, with over 366 million text messages sent daily.

sections.title: MCI VOD
sections.description: This platform offers a new experience for watching movies online. Users can watch their desired films online by purchasing tickets either with cash or using their SIM card credit. For easy access, the link to watch the movie is sent via SMS to the subscriber's mobile number.

sections.title: MESSENGER SUPER APP
sections.description: This application launched in 2018 with two services: VOD and messaging. Rubika's main goal is to create a sweet and easy digital life experience for users in the virtual space. Over the years, it has aimed to get closer to this goal by expanding its services and improving their performance. Today, this super app offers messaging, VOD, Rubino, shopping, food delivery, mobile top-up, and cinema ticketing—all in a single application—striving to realize a complete digital lifestyle.

sections.title: HOME SERVICE PLATFORM
sections.description: This online service platform has been operating in Iran since 2017, aiming to simplify access to various home and workplace services for users. The platform brings together specialists and service providers in categories such as home appliance repair, cleaning, plumbing, automotive, and beauty, enabling users to order services online quickly and reliably.

kids.title: Jóvenes
kids.subtitle: Un ecosistema seguro que los empodera
kids.description: MCI proporciona un entorno digital seguro, supervisado y empoderador diseñado específicamente para niños y adolescentes. Con controles parentales, contenido apropiado para cada edad, recursos educativos y herramientas creativas, aseguramos que los usuarios jóvenes puedan explorar, aprender y conectarse en un espacio protegido. Nuestro ecosistema enfocado en niños fomenta hábitos digitales saludables mientras estimula la creatividad, curiosidad y crecimiento en la próxima generación.

sections.title: MCI ACADEMY
sections.description: Founded in 2020, this academy operates with the goal of bridging the gap between academic education and the labor market needs in the ICT sector. The academy offers specialized courses and bootcamps across seven schools, including Artificial Intelligence, Data Science, Telecommunications Technologies, Internet of Things, Security, Digital Business, and Personal Development.

sections.title: KIDS E-ACADEMY
sections.description: This service leverages modern educational technologies to provide interactive video content from elementary school to the university entrance exam. With comprehensive coverage of subjects, gifted student packages, and collaboration with top teachers, it paves the way for academic success.

sections.title: KIDS CODE ACADEMY
sections.description: This online platform, launched in March 2024, is designed to teach programming to children and teenagers aged 7 to 12. By combining education with interactive and creative games, it creates an engaging learning environment that requires no prior knowledge or guidance.

sections.title: KIDS TV
sections.description: This VOD service, designed specifically for children and teenagers, is offered through an application. With an engaging and user-friendly interface, the platform provides movies, series, and animations tailored to each age group, supported by age-based categorization and controlled access.

sections.title: KIDS CARE
sections.description: This application is a parental control program designed to safely manage mobile usage for children aged 2 to 14. With features such as app and game locking, screen time management, and providing age-appropriate entertainment content, it enables parents to securely monitor their children's digital activities.

sections.title: KIDS VOD
sections.description: This service is a tool for making informed choices about movies and animations, providing information on violence, messages, and social issues to help users select the best options for themselves and their families.

sections.title: KIDS TALENT
sections.description: The National Talent Discovery Event is part of MCI's event series and is held with the aim of educating and nurturing the next generation of talent in the field of digital technologies. This event is specifically designed for students in grades 7 to 12.

b2b.title: B2B y B2G
b2b.subtitle: Potenciando empresas y gobiernos inteligentes
b2b.description: MCI ofrece soluciones de nivel empresarial que impulsan negocios inteligentes y operaciones gubernamentales modernas. Desde infraestructura de IoT y servicios en la nube hasta conectividad segura y análisis impulsados por IA, nuestras ofertas B2B y B2G permiten a las organizaciones optimizar operaciones, mejorar la productividad e impulsar la transformación digital a escala. Nos asociamos con empresas y gobiernos para construir el futuro inteligente de Irán.
b2b.intro: With the aim of providing comprehensive and specialized services to businesses, MCI (Hamrah Aval) has launched its B2B services since 2017. These services are designed with a focus on the communication and digital needs of organizations.

sections.title: SMART LOGISTICS
sections.description: The Smart Logistics service is a comprehensive, locally developed solution for real-time monitoring of the security status of containers and the country's transportation fleet, designed to enhance transparency, safety, and efficiency in the supply chain.

sections.title: IOT
sections.description: As Iran's leading mobile operator, MCI has built a comprehensive IoT ecosystem to empower businesses and industries with smart connectivity solutions. The platform enables seamless integration of devices, sensors, and applications.

sections.title: CONNECTED CAR
sections.description: This service consists of three components: hardware, platform, and user application. Key features include real-time monitoring of vehicle status, fleet tracking, and the ability to make emergency calls for immediate assistance.

sections.title: SMART AGRICULTURE
sections.description: With the introduction of its Smart Agriculture service powered by IoT, MCI has taken a major step toward the digital transformation of the country's agriculture industry. By connecting sensors, equipment, and environmental data to an integrated platform, this service enables intelligent monitoring.

sections.title: CLOUD SERVICES
sections.description: SASS is a solution aimed at managing sensitive organizational information and increasing employees' access to data. This service helps organizations store any file and access them at any time and from any location.

sections.title: AI SERVICES
sections.description: AI Platform is a powerful cloud service for artificial intelligence, where any machine learning model can be easily built, trained, and deployed. Among the AI-based services are the Intelligent Voice Assistant (IVA), HoloBox, AI Interview, and others.

sections.title: SMART UTILITY
sections.description: The Energy Management System provided by MCI includes smart meter-based consumption management, development of telecommunications infrastructure, creation and enhancement of meter-reading software, and delivery of intelligent services.

sections.title: CHAT BOT
sections.description: MCI, leveraging advanced Large Language Model (LLM) technology, has developed an intelligent system that enables natural and smart interactions through text and voice. This system is offered in three formats: Chatbot, Intelligent Virtual Assistant (IVA), and HoloBox.

sim.title: Tarjeta SIM
sim.subtitle: Comunicación flexible para cada necesidad
sim.description: Los servicios de tarjetas SIM de MCI ofrecen soluciones de comunicación flexibles, confiables y accesibles adaptadas a diversas necesidades de usuarios. Ya sea para uso personal, empresarial o dispositivos IoT, nuestras ofertas de SIM proporcionan cobertura nacional, planes competitivos y conectividad fluida. Con un compromiso con la calidad y accesibilidad, MCI asegura que todos permanezcan conectados sin importar dónde estén.
